properties.name: 228 east 10th street
properties.description: Posted by Kipod228 east 10th street, 10009the longest i lived in one apartment: 1992-1999. roof access with a great view of the wtc and fireworks. around the corner from coyote ugly. left after an electrical fire in the wall of the downstairs neighbor brought home how much i was paying to live in unsafe and cramped conditions. moved to cranford next.

properties.name: 312 west main street
properties.description: Posted by Kipod312 west main street, bloomsburg, pa 17815lost my virginity: 1987, a snow-day from school so obviously winter sometime...his name was mark and he looked like a young bono with muscles.

properties.name: abe, the asshole landlord, 07/06, 3:10pm
properties.description: Posted by Kipod138th street and 8th avenue, ny, ny 10030i called him to arrange for the super to come up and switch the tumblers in the door back. we had bought and installed new ones when we moved in and abe kept the old ones to put back when we left. he got all snippy with me: "why you always want to change everything?!? just leave the locks the way they are!" i informed him that, as i paid 00 for these locks i damn well was not giving them to him. "well, call a locksmith, it is not my problem." with literally one arm tied down, i got one of two locks apart and the tumbler removed and then put back into place with just my leatherman in less than 10 minutes. so screw you, abe. i\'ll take care of this myself and leave your door wide open and lockless monday morning.

properties.name: bloodsuckin' dominos pizza!  07/09, 8:15pm
properties.description: Posted by Kipod2593 8th ave, 10030ordered a pizza at 7:08. delivery guy called an confirmed address (!) at 7:29, said he was 3 min away and could i wait OUTSIDE for him. i do (!?!), for over 10 min and he doesn\'t come. i call him. no answer. i call the store. they ask me to wait 2 more min. i do (!??!?!). i call back. i tell them i\'m not paying and they say "we\'re not giving you a pizza for free" (WTF!?! it\'s BEEN over 30 min by HER admission!). i go back upstairs at 7:50. delivery guy calls me back saying he went to the cross streets and there was no such street number--and he tells me THE WRONG cross streets (after he confirmed!). i tell him i\'m not going outside again, he\'s coming to me. he agrees. and never shows up. i write a nasty email to customer service and call and cancel the order--and the woman says "ok" like THAT\'s the solution to the problem! I\'M HUNGRY!!! when i rule the world, they will ALL pay...

properties.name: bloomsburg hospital
properties.description: Posted by Kipod bloomsburg hospitalborn: feb 18, 1971, 8am (give or take)

properties.name: cranford apartment
properties.description: Posted by Kipod109 alden street, cranford, nj109 alden street, sept. 1999-sept. 2001. the most space i ever had all to myself...top two floors of a house with a back yard and off-street parking. i hid in the attic-cum-bedroom most the time and never unpacked most of my boxes.

properties.name: first time in love and with a girl
properties.description: Posted by Kipod11 university place, 10003kaye\'s dorm room, december 1989

properties.name: jersey city apartment
properties.description: Posted by Kipod216 8th street, 07302also known as "where i was when the towers fell". lived there from sept. 2001-sept. 2003...and again as a guest of my former landlords (now good friends) oct. 2005-march 2006.

properties.name: losaida apartment
properties.description: Posted by Kipod53 avenue c, 10009lived here for most of college, back when it wasn\'t hip. shot at the junkies through the paneless kitchen window with a bb rifle to dissuade them from shooting up while we ate. found an abandoned tiger-strped kitten and named her martina. raised her up and gave her away when i eventually moved to cranford. she was my last pet. got mugged one night coming home from school and moved out a few months later.

properties.name: recording sounds for frida
properties.description: Posted by Kipod216 8th street, jersey city, nj 07302i was in the bedroom closet of my new apartment, trying to record sound effects for the bizarre puppet sequence after the trolley and bus collide in "frida". couldn\'t figure out where the demolition and sirens were coming from...went outside to move the car and saw a cloud of smoke where the towers should have been.

properties.name: richland center
properties.description: Posted by Kipodrichland center, wiafter running out of money and withdrawing from college in december of \'89, i followed kaye home for the holidays in hopes of finding a new place to anchor myself in the twin cities...

properties.name: stern hall (now goddard hall)
properties.description: Posted by Kipod79 washington square east, 10003my dorm for the first semester of college. hated my roommate, amanda. fell in love with her "new best friend" kaye.

properties.name: the capitol theater
properties.description: Posted by Kipod 15 east main street, 17815saw first movie in a theater: star wars, summer of 1977. saw imperial cruiser fly over the camera and reported "that\'s what i want to do when i grow up." fell asleep and missed the death star exploding.

properties.name: the cartwheel
properties.description: Posted by Kipod 437 york road, new hope, pa 18938first gay club: late december, 1987. went for a weekend with my gay friend jimmy to (supposedly) check out the nyu film school. most important part of the trip though was getting into my first gay club. no i.d., but a pathetic story about being a visitor from czechoslovakia (the bouncer took pity on me). got drunk on zimas, was inimidated by all the mullets and hard looks (apparantly a butch show of affection), bruised some ribs when i got whipped around a corner too quickly by jimmy (to avoid an off-duty state cop that everyone was dubious of) and jammed myself into a guard rail. good times...apparantly damaged by a fire in 2005, not sure if it\'s reopened yet.

properties.name: the idiot with the soccer ball, 7/1/06 3:30pm
properties.description: Posted by Kipod houston and mercer, nyche was rooting for brazil according to his yellow/green football jersey. he was kicking a soccer ball down the sidewalk. he body checked me as he passed, slamming into the shoulder i just had rotator cuff surgery on as if the sling was a fashion statement. i am icing my sutures down as i type. i wish i could turn back time so i could kick this guy in the nuts before he hit me. as it stands, i\'ll have to take some solace in the fact that about two hours after he pissed me off, his team lost to france. LET THAT BE A LESSON TO ANYONE THINKING OF PISSING ME OFF!

properties.name: tisch school of the arts, nyu
properties.description: Posted by Kipod  721 broadway, ny, ny 10003undergrad: 1989-1995 (with a year and a half off after first semester). 18 credits each semester (the most you could take without paying extra), 30 hours of work a week (in the sound dept, 11th floor). i spent more money and time in this building then any other in my life.
